actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bankruptcy Act of 1898, as amended, to permit the Judicial Conference of the United States to change salaries of Referees in Bankruptcy more often than once in any 2 years.

summary.text: Permits the Judicial Conference of the United States, under the Bankruptcy Act of 1898, to change salaries of referees in bankruptcy more often than once in any two years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bankruptcy Act of 1898, as amended, to permit the Judicial Conference of the United States to change salaries of Referees in Bankruptcy more often than once in any 2 years.
